★ Release Notes: 2021-10-27 ★
≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡

Thanks for upgrading to the latest version of the ALKS CLI!

* Fixes a bug with storing/retrieving your network password from the OS keychain. This may cause you to have to enter it in again

Have feedback? https://github.com/Cox-Automotive/ALKS-CLI/issues
 
☁☁☁☁☁☁  Happy Clouding! ☁☁☁☁☁☁
